procedure.name: General Dental Care Authorization
covered_procedures: Use of local anesthesia and nitrous oxide sedation
Use of diagnostic aids including radiographs
Treatment of oral hard and soft tissues
procedure.description: This document authorizes general dental diagnosis and treatment while also collecting patient demographic, medical, dental, insurance, privacy, and financial information.

risks_and_complications: Allergic reactions to medications, anesthesia, or sedative drugs
Pain, swelling, bleeding, bruising, nausea, or vomiting
Temporary or permanent numbness or tingling of lips, tongue, face, or neck
Instrument breakage during root canal treatment requiring additional procedures
Sinus involvement during extraction of upper molars
Incomplete removal of tooth fragments to prevent nerve or sinus injury
Jaw fracture in rare cases of difficult extractions
Respiratory or cardiovascular complications related to anesthesia or sedation
Rare risk of oxygen deprivation, coma, or death associated with anesthesia
Failure of treatment if post-operative instructions are not followed
Financial responsibility for services not covered by insurance
patient_responsibilities: Provide accurate and complete medical and dental history
Inform the dentist of any changes in health status
Follow all post-operative and post-care instructions
Pay for services not covered by insurance

scope: Authorization to perform dental procedures listed in the consent
Authorization to administer anesthesia and sedation
Authorization to modify treatment plans if necessary
Authorization to use anonymized clinical records for teaching or research
Authorization for disclosure of health information as outlined in the Notice of Privacy Practices
authorization.text: I authorize National Dental PLLC to perform dental procedures, administer anesthesia and sedation, modify treatment plans as needed, and use anonymized records for educational or research purposes.

right_to_refuse.description: Patient retains the right to refuse treatment and may terminate consent at any time.
